<size=72><color=#ee7500>TO CLEAR MORE</c></size>

containing cubes.</c></size>
<color=#212935>Drag cubes to the board to score points.</c>

the board and score bonus points.</c>
<color=#212935>Remember to use a rare WILD TILE to clear cubes and score extra points.</c>

<color=#212935>The more lines you clear, the more
